title: 03/17/21 DPS Hour 2 Rick Pitino
itunes:title: 03/17/21 DPS Hour 2 Rick Pitino
description:
Rick Pitino tells Dan that he is not looking to leave Iona because of the way they flew to see him to hire him. coach says Iona is the final stop of his coaching career.
